name: Roller
description:
This is a colorful casual game in which you control the ball and get through obstacles.
The game targets your senses with the colors and music, making it a fun and addicting experience.

Gameplay

Select between four rollers with different attributes and select your game mode.
The objective of the game is to get as far as possible without falling.
You can jump and turn but you cannot stop.

Game modes

The Career mode allows you to experience all the game modes.
The others allow you to test your skill specifically.
